name: A Cage of Love (2017)
description:
A Cage of Love is a game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38. It was my 4th participation. The gameplay of the game is rather classic and not very inspired. I tried to focus on the story and graphics. The game tells the story of two lovers lost in a world disappearing around them.

My results :

Overall: 345 (3.143 average in 30 ratings)
Fun: 464 (2.571 average in 30 ratings)
Innovation: 258 (3.179 average in 30 ratings)
Theme:10 (4.379 average in 31 ratings)
Graphics: 276 (3.241 average in 31 ratings)
Audio: 233 (3.037 average in 29 ratings)
Humor: 336 (2.261 average in 25 ratings)
Mood: 131 (3.536 average in 30 ratings)

A Cage of Love est un jeu réalisé en 48 heures pour la Ludum Dare 38 (ma 4ème participation au concours). Le gameplay est très classique est peu inspiré. J'ai essayé de me concentrer sur l'histoire, la narration et les graphismes. Le jeu raconte l'histoire de deux amoureux perdus dans un monde qui disparaît autour d'eux.

Page Ludum Dare : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum...
